task.role: You are a Rust developer creating a simple calculator module with basic arithmetic operations.
task.goal: Create a Rust module `src/calculator.rs` with functions for add, subtract, multiply, and divide.

requirement.title: Create Calculator Module
requirement.code: pub fn add(a: i32, b: i32) -> i32 pub fn subtract(a: i32, b: i32) -> i32 pub fn multiply(a: i32, b: i32) -> i32 pub fn divide(a: i32, b: i32) -> Result<i32, &'static str>

requirement.title: Handle Division by Zero
requirement.description: The `divide` function must return `Err("division by zero")` when `b` is 0.

requirement.title: Add Tests
requirement.description: Create unit tests in the same file using `#[cfg(test)]` module.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: divide function implemented with Result type
